title: Kidnappings Inspire Photojournalist Lynsey Addario's Memoir
teaser: American photojournalist Lynsey Addario, who has survived kidnappings in Iraq and Libya, talks to Renee Montagne about her new book, It's What I Do: A Photographer's Life of Love and War.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
